thread.title: Travis Sperberg
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Travis Sperberg

author: Travis Sperberg
title: Travis Sperberg
text: My first order was processed quickly and was very good. My second order was never delivered and I have contacted them many times since the scheduled delivery date and have only received generic responses with no action to resolve the issue. I hope to eventually get my money back but things are not looking good so far. Update I did get my money back finally.
